page.title: 18ST.THOMAS,A CITY VILLAGE.
page.content: St.Thomas is a suburb of Exeter,and used to be a village outside Exeter; and is divided by the river into two separate communities.Our area has its own shopping centre and most ameneties Many of the houses are small Victorian terrace houses.Newer houses have been built in some of the gardens of larger houses,so the architecture is varied. The people who live here follow a variety of occupations like plumbers, taxi-drivers,roofers,electricians,and civil servants.St.Thomas is an area with many small commercial concerns as well as a residential area.We found a large number of hair dressers,and many small garages specialising in different aspects of motor repair.
